dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3597328F] Notice Of Potential Legal Action Against Livelonely.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 23, 2007 11:40 AM
To: Copyright
Cc: Legal
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3597328F] Notice Of Potential Legal Action
Against Livelonely.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Notice Of Potential Legal Action Against Livelonely.com

MIME element (text/plain) 
[[ This message has been bounced by Cerberus Helpdesk ]] 
Originally sent on Thu Mar 22 2007 06:20PM by thenaib@thesietch.org: 
 
One of the sites you host, liveloney.com is nothing more than a spam
blog 
stealing my feed (www.blog.thesietch.org) and many many others, and then

posting the content on his site.  If you do not contact the owner of
this 
blog and make them stop I will be forced to look into legal action
against 
your company. 
 
 
Thank you in advance for your time. 
 
Shane Jordan 
webmaster 
Thesietch.org
